song.title: For Faith
song.info:
A little Chiptune created in 1993.Made this one for a Packmenu by Faith, but never got used
Got finally featured on the Soundtrack of a tiny little Freeware Game called "Magic Vials".
Game Download: http://www.portalprogramas.com/en/magic-vials/
Free Soundtrack Download (Mp3 + Mods as a bonus): https://coucounetlabel.bandcamp.com/album/triace-magic-vials-ep-coucou029
